title: Getting Messages for Free Recharges on Jio? Don’t Fall for Them
subtitle: Jio Recharge 399 Plan Fact Check: Reliance Jio is one of the few telcos in India which is offering attractive prepaid recharge plans for its users in the country. In fact, these plans have helped the telco to become the leading operator in India.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Reliance Jio is one of the few telcos in India which are offering attractive prepaid recharge plans for its users in the country. In fact, these plans have helped the telco become the leading operator in India, with over 340 million users on its network.

But if any of you are getting messages about a free Jio recharge offer for a Reliance Jio mobile number, do not fall for it.

In fact, do not entertain any such requests and definitely don’t click on any website link, which could instead steal your personal information from the device.
